name: Pizza Kidd
storyline: In a world on the brink of destruction, one unlikely hero steps forward. KIDD, a young martial artist as swift with punches and kicks as he is with delivering your pizza, is humanity’s last hope. Pizza Kidd pulses with the spirit and edginess of 90s anime and the grit of classic arcade brawlers of the same era, blending beautifully detailed 16-bit pixel art with fast-paced, responsive combat. This isn’t just another "indie" game—it’s an electrifying homage to a golden era, crafted with love and modern flair to keep things feeling fresh yet familiar.
summary: Kidd Games presents: an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world - featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.
